problem: 如图,已知点M是线段AB的中点,N是线段AM上的点,且满足AN:MN=1:2,若AN=2cm,则线段AB=()
answer: 【解答】解:∵AN:MN=1:2,且AN=2,∴2:MN=1:2,∴MN=4cm,∴AM=6cm．∵M是线段AB的中点,∴AB=2AM,∴AB=12cm,故D答案正确．
comment: 本题是一道求有关线段长度的几何问题,考查了利用线段的比求线段的长度,线段中点的意义和运用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the known point M is the midpoint of the line segment AB, N is the point on the line segment AM, and meets AN: MN = N_0:N_1, if AN = N_2, then the line segment AB = ()
